snippet.title: Mew-Genics Teaser!
snippet.description:
Intro cut scene for Mew-Genics by Edmund McMillen, creator of The Binding of Isaac.

coming to Steam and other stuff?

full soundtrack by Ridiculon
http://ridiculon.bandcamp.com/

for more info add me on twitter @edmundmcmillen
